channel.title: CVE Feed for checkpoint -- Harmony Endpoint.
channel.description: The latest CVEs for checkpoint -- Harmony Endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2023-28134|2024-09-03T18:31:14.621Z -- checkpoint -- harmony%20endpoint.
item.description: Local attacker can escalate privileges on affected installations of Check Point Harmony Endpoint/ZoneAlarm Extreme Security. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
